alert.note: Alert for Eastern Black Range Foothills; Lowlands of the Bootheel; Northern Dona Ana County; Sierra County Lakes; Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southern Gila Foothills, Mimbres Valley; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range; Southwest Desert, Lower Gila River Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin; Uplands of the Bootheel (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 04 at 2:52AM MST until March 04 at 8:00PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. East slope locations will see occasionally stronger winds. * WHERE...For all of Hidalgo and Luna Counties and portions of Dona Ana, Grant, and Sierra Counties in southern New Mexico. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 8 PM MST Friday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds will make driving hazardous, especially along north/south running roads and highways. The strong winds will also create areas of blowing dust which will cause quickly changing visibilities for motorists.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
